Recommendations: There is an existing housing facilities for students, faculty and staffs but needs repair and additional amenities.
Additional storage facilities may be provided for athletics, sports and other curricular training equipment and be strategically located.
The administration may secure certificate of occupancy for its buildings and be made visible.
The fire escape plan be visibly posted in all buildings for the safety of all stakeholders.
The administration may consider the refurbishment of the canteen/cafeteria facilities to provide better services to clientele.
Installment of fire alarm system may be done as soon as possible.
